name: ChickenZ (itch)
description:
You are a chicken. You know nothing of your backstory, your family, you know nothing of your past...

ALL YOU KNOW IS YOU MUST KILL.

Kill zombie chickens! Red zombie chickens! Chickens with a coconut on their head! There is no limit to how much you can kill! (until, you reach the number cap, 9999, but, of course, you'll never reach that. And you can still kill anyways.)

Get gun upgrades! Armor upgrades! Helmet upgrades!
